title: Peasants and Kings
description: My entire life has been a lie.And then I meet a mysterious, powerful billionaire who makes me an offer I canâ€™t refuse.My body comes alive under his sensuous touch.But Hadrian Rhys is a man with a dark past and a broken soul.I never expected him to fall in love with me.Now my secrets are coming back to destroy us.Bloodlines, alliances, and murderous restitution lie buried deep within my past.My name is Sterling Miller.You won't believe who I am.
author: Emma Slate
